activities: DM2 is a technology services, management consulting, and outsourcing company helping clients become successful. We provide expertise and knowledge in business and technology strategies to provide our clients with leading methodologies and practices across innovation, learning, performance, mobile and cloud technologies. Our focus is on the integration of the HR and IT Functions with technology, data science and innovation. We support our clients in the scoping, design, configuration, deployment and maintence of global HR or IT initiatives including enterprise HR Systems and applications as well as Mobile and Cloud Technologies.
